content:
Note that the prep webinar for the Connectathon is scheduled for May 11, 1-2pm ET (normal meeting time) using the following coordinates:

Join Zoom Meeting - https://zoom.us/j/5100467805 | Meeting ID: 510 046 7805 | +1 929-436-2866-US (New York) | Find your local number: https://zoom.us/u/acrJHLNHol
The relevant materials are:

Draft IG Build: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/v2-to-fhir/branches/master/index.html
Draft IG GitHub: https://github.com/HL7/v2-to-fhir/
Original Source Mapping Spreadsheets: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PaFYPSSq4oplTvw_4OgOn6h2Bs_CMvCAU9CqC4tPBgk/edit#gid=0
Track Description: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05++v2-to-FHIR
